name: Toggl PHP SDK
body:
### Requirements

* PHP 5.3 or greater
* [cURL](http://us.php.net/manual/en/book.curl.php) PHP extension
* [JSON](http://us.php.net/manual/en/book.json.php) PHP extension
* [PHPUnit](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/) (for running unit tests)

### Usage

```
<?php
$api_token = '00000000000000000000000000000000'; // Valid Toggl.com API token
$connection = new TogglConnection($api_token);
$time_entry = TogglTimeEntry::load($connection, 1); // Load time entry #1.
$time_entry->description = 'New description for #1.'
$time_entry->save();
?>
```

## Links

* [Toggl.com API reference](https://www.toggl.com/public/api)
tagline: PHP SDK for the Toggl API
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
